title: UK Court Finds BHP Liable for Brazil’s Worst Environmental Disaster
summary: Mining giant BHP has been found liable for a dam disaster under both environmental law and the Brazilian civil code, in a significant ruling handed down by the High Court. title: Decoding the Fine Print: An Investor’s Guide to Energy Contracts
summary: We spend a lot of our time talking about reserves and capacity in the energy sector. But for the serious money, the most critical asset isn't the price of oil or the megawatt. title: US regulator will permit companies to exclude shareholder proposals from proxies
summary: Securities and Exchange Commission could reshape corporate governance by making it harder for investors to seek changes

title: Kurdistan Oil Exports Resume as Foreign Firms Load First Shipment

title: Poland’s Oil Giant Orlen Plugs Into EV Charging Market

title: TotalEnergies Boosts Power Business with $5.9 Billion Europe Deal
summary: TotalEnergies is expanding its power business in Europe with a multi-billion all-stock deal to buy 50% of the flexible power generation assets of Czech firm EPH.
